$interpreted: Guard: Stop! No one enters without the Queen's permission!
Hyde: The Queen? Heheh... So, you still haven't heard the news. I suppose it takes a while for word to reach down to these gutters.
Guard: Leave now, or things are gonna get nasty!
Hyde: I thought you'd be doing miserably...
Hyde: —Looks like Her Majesty the Queen has been too kindly.
???: Hyde Oust... Heheh, so you've finally been abandoned by the sect. Have you decided to run back to the Carlos family with your tail between your legs, then?
Hyde: Save it. I was called here by the Second Parhelion.
???: The Second...?
Lord Serafin : Proud Queen that you are, please make your decisions wisely...
Angelia: I...
Naya: Angelia...!
Angelia: I'm here! I'm okay, I'm...
Naya: An... Angelia... The Dracontines... You mustn't... Guh! *cough* *cough*...
Angelia: Naya...
Hyde: Hmm? Are we interrupting something here?
Angelia: ...Hyde... and—Zola?!
Zola: It's a true joy to see the torment on your face, Carlos.
Angelia: ......
Angelia: ...I don't expect the Dracontines sent someone all this way just to torment me. Is that why you've locked Naya and me up?
Hyde: Sigh. You have a history of escapes, Your Highness, and the sect don't overlook such things.
Hyde: Naturally we have only the utmost respect for the Queen. We're here to advise you to work together with us.
Angelia: We can talk, but at least see to it that Naya is all right, first...
Zola: Ugh. No. 2 needs your response as soon as possible. I suppose you won't cooperate until she's already dead though, is that it?
Hyde: Contain yourself, you're making this difficult.
Hyde: She knows she faces certain death if Theodore returns. We ought to admire a friendship as firm as this. And so...
Angelia: Is that... an insignia of the Twelve Nobles?
Hyde: I heard that the Nobles only wear them on important occasions, to express their reverence. There's a sun on the front, and the shadow of the sun on the back.
Hyde: If this badge lies with the back facing up, then you'll put away your foolishness and cooperate with our suggestions.
Angelia: I won't talk with you at all, unless...
Hyde: If it's the right side up—I'll have Miss Rosset looked after.
Hyde: ...Of course, I'll see to it that she stays alive, and no more.
Zola: This isn't part of our orders. Are you thinking of betraying the sect?
Hyde: It's just a little something to pass the time with. I'm not like a certain other person we know who loses their sense of fun the moment they've been locked up.
Hyde: So, want to see if fate will take pity on you? Your Highness?
Angelia: If it's an honest wager... Then I agree.
Zola: Hmph...
Zola: I never had a choice, before Shirley was taken away from me...
Zola: So why on earth... does this Carlos get to have such an opportunity?!
Hyde: Second Parhelion ordered you to assist me. How many times must I remind you of that, Zola!
Zola: Hmph.... Heh... Ahahaha...
Hyde: What are you doing?! You damn crazy girl...!
Zola: You're nothing but a lousy dog at the bottom of the sect. All you know how to do is bark and bark, "Second Parhelion" this, "Second Parhelion" that!
Angelia: So...
Angelia: ...That settles that, then.
Hyde: Always holding onto naive fantasies, even in situations as dire as this. Only you, Angelia.
Zola: Heheh... What? Both sides are the same?
Zola: Playing with fakes is cheating, Hyde Oust.
Hyde: —It isn't a fake.
Hyde: A long, long time ago... Many nobles had insignia just like this one.
Angelia: You've gone to all this trouble, just to play a trick on me...?
Hyde: You can sense it, but you're powerless to change. That was Theodore, and now it's you. As far as the sect is concerned, you're both the same. Front and back, both alike.
Zola: ...No. The Carloses may all be equally detestable, but for the Second Parhelion, for the Feather Tribe—
Zola: —Theodore can never, EVER be forgiven...!!
Angelia: (Does the Second Parhelion hate my uncle just as much as Zola...?)
Hyde: Yes, Theodore is truly despicable. I'm sure you've experienced his cruel methods up close and personal, no?
Angelia: ......
Hyde: If you really wish to save yourself, you'll work together with the Dracontines. It's simple, all you have to do—is nod your head.
Angelia: (The Dracontines are controlling the Twelve Noble Houses... The royal family compromises with the nobles... Compromise is the monarch's fate...)
Angelia: (—And if that's so...)
Angelia: I am Queen of the Kingdom of the Sun. Even if my uncle is my enemy, I can't let darkness overrun the sun!
Hyde: Another humdrum, boring answer, Angelia.
Zola: So what~
Zola: The more she resists, the sooner the sect will give up on her. Don't make us wait too long, now, Carlos.
Angelia: ......

Model.Text: Stop! No one enters without the Queen's permission!
The Queen? Heheh... So, you still haven't heard the news. I suppose it takes a while for word to reach down to these gutters.
Leave now, or things are gonna get nasty!
I thought you'd be doing miserably...
—Looks like Her Majesty the Queen has been too kindly.
Hyde Oust... Heheh, so you've finally been abandoned by the sect. Have you decided to run back to the Carlos family with your tail between your legs, then?

The Second...?
Proud Queen that you are, please make your decisions wisely...
Angelia...!
I'm here! I'm okay, I'm...
An... Angelia... The Dracontines... You mustn't... Guh! *cough* *cough*...
Naya...

I won't talk with you at all, unless...
If it's the right side up—I'll have Miss Rosset looked after.
...Of course, I'll see to it that she stays alive, and no more.

It's just a little something to pass the time with. I'm not like a certain other person we know who loses their sense of fun the moment they've been locked up.
So, want to see if fate will take pity on you? Your Highness?
If it's an honest wager... Then I agree.
Hmph...
I never had a choice, before Shirley was taken away from me...
So why on earth... does this Carlos get to have such an opportunity?!

Hmph.... Heh... Ahahaha...
What are you doing?! You damn crazy girl...!
You're nothing but a lousy dog at the bottom of the sect. All you know how to do is bark and bark, "Second Parhelion" this, "Second Parhelion" that!
So...
...That settles that, then.
Always holding onto naive fantasies, even in situations as dire as this. Only you, Angelia.
Heheh... What? Both sides are the same?
Playing with fakes is cheating, Hyde Oust.
—It isn't a fake.
A long, long time ago... Many nobles had insignia just like this one.

Yes, Theodore is truly despicable. I'm sure you've experienced his cruel methods up close and personal, no?
If you really wish to save yourself, you'll work together with the Dracontines. It's simple, all you have to do—is nod your head.
(The Dracontines are controlling the Twelve Noble Houses... The royal family compromises with the nobles... Compromise is the monarch's fate...)
(—And if that's so...)

Another humdrum, boring answer, Angelia.
So what~
